scikits.statsmodels.sandbox.descstats.descstats¶

scikits.statsmodels.sandbox.descstats.descstats(data, cols=None, axis=0)¶

Prints descriptive statistics for one or multiple variables.

Parameters:

data: numpy array :

x is the data

v: list, optional :

A list of the column number or field names (for a recarray) of variables. Default is all columns.

axis: 1 or 0 :

axis order of data. Default is 0 for column-ordered data.

Previous topic

scikits.statsmodels.sandbox.descstats.sign_test
